detectors.description:
BalancerRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerRewards__1.sol#704-719) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerRewards__1.sol#710)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerRewards__1.sol#713)

		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BalancerRewards__1.sol#645)
